report.name: isuivilb

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select distinct SUBSTR(r.rnom,1,5)||'-'|| r.ident IDENT, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'01/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_1, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'02/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_2, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'03/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_3, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'04/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_4, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'05/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_5, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'06/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_6, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'07/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_7, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'08/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_8, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'09/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_9, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'10/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_10, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'11/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_11, TO_NUMBER(pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois(c.ident,a.sous_tache,'12/'||to_char(c.cdeb,'YYYY'))) MOIS_12, a.pid PID, e.typetape TYPETAPE, SUBSTR(e.libetape,1,30) LIBETAPE, SUBSTR(t.libtache,1,30) LIBTACHE, SUBSTR(st.asnom,1,30) ASNOM, st.aist AIST, e.ecet, t.acta, st.acst from isac_consomme c, isac_affectation a, isac_sous_tache st, isac_tache t, isac_etape e, ressource r, datdebex d where c.ident =a.ident and c.sous_tache=a.sous_tache and a.sous_tache=st.sous_tache and st.tache=t.tache and t.etape=e.etape and r.ident=a.ident and TRUNC(c.cdeb,'YEAR')=TRUNC(d.datdebex,'YEAR') &P_WHERE order by IDENT;

dataDescriptor.expression: TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '01/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '02/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '03/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '04/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '05/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '06/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '07/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '08/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '09/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '10/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '11/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )
TO_NUMBER ( pack_liste_isac_conso.f_get_cusag_mois ( c.ident , a.sous_tache , '12/' || to_char ( c.cdeb , 'YYYY' ) ) )

function.name: afterpform
f_ident1formattrigger
m_6formattrigger
cf_1formula
